import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; function Home() { const { currentUser } = useAuth(); const [recentActivities, setRecentActivities] = useState([]); // Function to add a new activity const addActivity = (activity) => { setRecentActivities(prevActivities => { const newActivities = [activity, ...prevActivities].slice(0, 3); // Keep only last 3 activities return newActivities; }); }; const getActivityIcon = (type) => { switch (type) { case 'quiz_completed': return
✓
; case 'chapter_started': return
📚
; case 'badge_earned': return
🏆
; default: return
📝
; } }; const formatTimeAgo = (timestamp) => { const now = new Date(); const diff = now - timestamp; const minutes = Math.floor(diff / 60000); const hours = Math.floor(minutes / 60); const days = Math.floor(hours / 24); if (days > 0) return `${days} day${days > 1 ? 's' : ''} ago`; if (hours > 0) return `${hours} hour${hours > 1 ? 's' : ''} ago`; if (minutes > 0) return `${minutes} minute${minutes > 1 ? 's' : ''} ago`; return 'just now'; }; // Render different content based on authentication status if (currentUser) { return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome back, {currentUser?.email || 'User'}!

Continue your journey through the Indian Constitution

Your Progress

0%

{/* Quick Actions Grid */}
📚

Continue Learning

Resume from Chapter 4: Fundamental Rights

❓

Daily Quiz

Test your knowledge with today's challenge

🎮

Compete with others in real-time

{/* Statistics and Progress Section */}

Your Achievements

0

Badges Earned

0

Points

0

Quizzes Completed

0

Chapters Completed

Recent Activity

{recentActivities.length > 0 ? ( recentActivities.map((activity, index) => (
{getActivityIcon(activity.type)}
{activity.type === 'quiz_completed' && ( <>

Completed Quiz: {activity.title}

Score: {activity.score}%

)} {activity.type === 'chapter_started' && ( <>

Started Chapter: {activity.title}

Progress: {activity.progress}%

)} {activity.type === 'badge_earned' && ( <>

Earned Badge: {activity.title}

{formatTimeAgo(activity.timestamp)}

)}
)) ) : (

No recent activity

Start learning to see your activities here

)}
{/* Learning Path */}

Learning Path

1

Preamble

2

Basic Structure

3

Fundamental Rights

); } // Landing page for non-authenticated users return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Learn the Indian Constitution

Discover the fundamental principles of the Indian Constitution through interactive lessons, quizzes, and games.

Get Started
{/* Features Section */}

Features

Interactive Learning

Engage with comprehensive lessons about the Indian Constitution, complete with multimedia content.

Daily Quizzes

Test your knowledge with daily quizzes and track your progress over time.

Gamified Experience

Earn badges, compete with friends, and make learning fun through our gamified platform.

{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to Start Learning?

Join thousands of learners who are discovering the Indian Constitution in a fun and engaging way.

Create Free Account
); } export default Home;
